tgt_original: evamāsūtrya taccakraṃ dīptadṛṣṭyā rajāṃsi tu |  prākkramajñānasaddīptyā samuktejyābhimantrayet ||241 ||
śvetaṃ pītaṃ tathā raktaṃ haritaṃ kṛṣṇameva ca |
samapradakṣiṇācchinnāvakrāṃ rekhā prapātayet ||244 ||  samāṃ ca pātayedrekhāṃ dvāraviśatibhāgikām |
mantraprayogamatulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam |  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ śākyasiṃhādibhirvaraiḥ ||194 ||
sarvakarmakṛtārakṣya dhyāyāddhṛtkaṇṭhamūrddhasu |  vajramabjaṃ tathā cakraṃ hū āḥ om teṣu vinyaset ||197 ||
hṛcchiraḥ kaṇṭhamālabhya dadyātpuṣpādikaṃ kramāt ||198 ||  puṣpaṃ mūrdhni puro dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ gandhaṃ punarhṛdi |
prāgudaṅmukhasaṃsthaistaiḥ khādayitvaiva prakṣipet |  gocarmamātrabhū lipte siddhiṃ śāntyādikāṃ diśet ||201 ||
ācamya tricalupānaṃ dattvā bāhye niveśya ca |
sūtraiḥ surakṣayet ||202 ||  tricalupānamantraḥ-om hrīḥ viśuddhadharma sarvapāpāni cāsya śodhaya sarvavikalpānapanaya hū |
tatsarvaṃ hi kṣayaṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā maṇḍalamīdṛśam ||205 ||
kimutānantayaśasāṃ mantracaryānaye sthitaḥ |  padaṃ hyanuttaraṃ yāti japanvai mantra(ntraṃ) tāyinām ||206 ||
sarvajñānāṃ kadā loke sambhavo jāyate na vā |
yena sattvārthamatulaṃ kartuṃ śaktā hyanirvṛtāḥ ||204 ||  anekakalpakoṭibhiryatkṛtaṃ pāpakaṃ purā |
na bhūyo maraṇaṃ vo'sti yānādasmānmahāsukhāt |  adhṛṣyāścāpyabaddhā(dhyā)
bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yadvajramiti mudrayā |  yasyotpādanamātreṇa buddha eva na saṃśayaḥ ||385 ||
saddharmo na pratikṣepyo na ca tyājyaḥ kadācana |
ajñānādvātha mohādvā na vai vivṛṇuyāt sa tu ||386 ||
om gha gha ghātaya ghātaya sarvaduṣṭān phaṭ kīlaya kīlaya sarvapāpān phaṭ hū hū hū vajra kīla[ya] vajradhara ājñāpayati kāyavākcittavajra kīlaya hū phaṭ |
adhaḥ śūlordhvavighnāriṃ dhiyā madhye prakīlayet |  vighnaughān ghātayet sarvān daśadiksaṃvyavasthitān ||163 ||
kṣmāṃ saṃlipya sugandhādyaiścitraiḥ puṣpaiḥ prakīrya ca |
candrādyaiścakriṇāṃ sthāne prakuryānmaṇḍalaṃ budhaḥ ||167 ||  tatrāvāhya tu sa ca(cca)  kraṃ kṛtvā sīmādibandhanam |
phalasthā bodhisattvāśca yāścānyā mantradevatāḥ ||177 ||  devatālokapālāśca bhūtāḥ saṃbodhiśāsitāḥ |
cakradviguṇato dīrghaṃ dvāraviṃśatibhāgikam |  pañcāmṛtasugandhena temayitvātha rakṣitam ||221 ||
trijjaḥ kāraistamāpreṣya jjaḥ jjaḥ jjaḥ ityapi svayaṃ punaḥ ||222 ||
dviguṇīkṛtya tatsūtraṃ cakramadhyeṣu dhārya ca |  cakrākāraṃ tato bāhyaṃ vajrasutradvayaṃ punaḥ ||227 ||  aiśānyāṃ cakravāḍaṃ ca svānupūrvyā pradakṣiṇāt |
animittairasiddhiḥ syāt sūtracchede guroḥ kṣayaḥ |  hīnātiriktato rogā diṅmohe śiṣyavibhramaḥ ||229 ||

src_original: སེམས་ཅན་རྣམས་ཀྱི་དོན་དུ་ཁྱོད་༎ ཡང་ནི་དུས་འདིར་གཤེགས་སུ་གསོལ་༎ ཞེས་བྱ་བ་དང་། ཐིག་སྐུད་ཀྱི་སྒྲས་ནམ་མཁའ་ལ་བཞུགས་པའི་དེ་བཞིན་གཤེགས་པ་རྣམས་བསྐུལ་ལ་། ཤར་དང་ནུབ་ཏུ་ཚངས་ཐིག་གདབ་པར་བྱའོ་༎ བྱང་དུ་མངོན་པར་ཕྱོགས་པ་དང་། ལྷོར་མངོན་པར་ཕྱོགས་པས་།
